name: The Underworld Underworld
description:
You've messed up.
You owe the Reaper Gang big time. And they've taken your soul as collateral.
But the big man himself is willing to give you another chance.
You just have to do him one small favor...

Controls:
- WASD: Move
- R: Reload
- Left Click: Primary Weapon
- Right Click: Secondary Weapon
- Scroll: Change Weapon
- Space: Advance Dialog
